pages.text: The one who choses the path of the $(d)Seeker$() seeks the truth, at all costs. They may be proclaimed as either extremely selfless, selfish, or both. They work by the passion of their hearts alone. To create such a powerful weapon, three different parts must be made and combined.
The $(d)Seeker's$() goal is to discover that which is true, with no concern for their own life or the lives of others. It is a dangerous path to take, but it can also be an extremely rewarding one...
